entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
